data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=82kE8TyW-JkQ7kNvgEoTaO3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAG9yqFFBqCA2nvgRpsXqpwfQifQDCTOqk6I9mivPf-qg&oe=66473DB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1WtKFLvHbV0Q7kNvgEI8LLW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDTzyToYAJz5gmAVubhWs1w33eXZXZ3ZwWV6OLTskNVHQ&oe=66474B52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uK9Sv2MkE0cQ7kNvgEDF_MV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDKnU267u5kL8dCVglqMCzdOQo0R5RsRWnaCPLzEbDiqw&oe=66474ED0)
